attributes.action: overhaul the money claim online website run by the lord chancellors dept
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The site is often down for several days without explanation.This is unacceptable given that this website is run by a government dept and that its fucntion is vital to her majesties court service and all claimants and defendants.The website has not worked for over one week a full overhaul of the service is needed.
